entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is feeling unwell and shaken after an incident.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, who comes to check on him and help him back to bed.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's, who told Ron to come and check on Harry.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts, who has been 'fiddling around with Harry's mind.'

entities.name: dean
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, who is not present when Ron comes to check on him.

entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Another one of Harry's friends, who is also not present when Ron comes to check on him.

relationships.description: Ron helps Harry back to bed.
Hermione is concerned for Harry's well-being and tells Ron to check on him.
Snape has been 'fiddling around with Harry's mind.'
